#summary XMPP extensions supported by the Saje Jabber plugin
#labels Phase-Design,Featured

= Supported XMPP Extensions =

The following is a list of the [http://www.xmpp.org/extensions/ XMPP Extensions] (XEPs) supported by the Jabber protocol plugin. These are extensions to the basic protocol as descibed in [http://www.xmpp.org/rfcs/rfc3920.html XMPP CORE] and [http://www.xmpp.org/internet-drafts/draft-saintandre-rfc3921bis-03.html XMPP IM].

|| XEP-0030 || Service Discovery ||
|| XEP-0083 || Nested Roster Groups ||
|| XEP-0085 || Chat State Notifications ||
|| XEP-0092 || Software Version ||
|| XEP-0100 || Gateway Interaction ||
